resources.string: Start-up Legal Connect is a platform intending to bring about an awareness in the Start-up Community regarding their cyber-legal aspects.
We enable you to get all your doubts regarding legal aspects of start-ups clarified through our legal mentors.
We also focus on the legal aspects of a start-up right from protecting your idea till execution of your idea and getting an investor on board.
We also help start-ups identify the common mistakes which they are not aware of yet have legal implications.
